verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
O may all who come
behind us
Find us faithful,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
May the fire
of our devotion
Light their way.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
May the footprints
that we leave,
Lead them to believe,

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
And the lives we live
Inspire them to obey.

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines:
O may all who come
behind us
Find us faithful.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
We're pilgrims
on the journey
of the narrow road,
And those
who've gone before us
line the way.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Cheering on the faithful,
encouraging the weary,
Their lives
a stirring testament
to God's sustaining grace.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Surrounded by so great
a cloud of witnesses,
Let us run the race
not only for the prize,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
But as those
who've gone before us.
Let us leave to those behind us,
The heritage of faithfulness
passed on thru godly lives.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
After all
our hopes and dreams
have come and gone,
And our children
sift thru all
we've left behind,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
May the clues
that they discover,
and the mem'ries
they uncover,

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
Become the light
that leads them,
to the road
we each must find.
